pkgmetadata.longdescription: pplogger========Logging helperPyPI package: `pplogger <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pplogger>`__If you spot any problems or have any improvement ideas then feel free toopen an issue and I will be glad to look into it for you.Installation------------A recommended way of installing the module is pip install.pip install~~~~~~~~~~~The tool is available in PyPI and can be installed using pip::: $ pip install --user pploggerUsage-----:: from pplogger import get_logger log = get_logger(debug=True) log.debug('Debug message')
